title: The kernel space of linear operator on a class of Grushin equation
abstract:
In this paper, we concern the kernel of linear operator for a class of
Grushin equation. First, we study the kernel space of linear operator for a
general Grushin equation. Then, we provide an exact expression for the kernel
space of linear operator for a special Grushin equation. Finally, we prove the
linear operator related to the singularly perturbed Grushin equation is
invertible when restricted to the complement of its approximate kernel space.
